title: CAR MODEL detail page Â» Successor
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see the successor of a CAR MODEL (if existent)\
So I can find out more about the family tree
description:
* the existing CAR MODEL detail page is extended 
* a section is added that displays the successor CAR MODEL
* when there is no successor connected then the section is not displayed at all
* the successor section contains a link to the resp. CAR MODEL
